programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando una mujer en Oregon es encontrada muerta en un asilo, la UAC se da cuenta que la víctima es parte de una serie de asesinatos rituales góticos y que el asesino podría ser satanista.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La hermana de Morgan ve a una muchacha que se parece a su prima supuestamente muerta. Morgan tiene que confesar a su familia la mentira que él dijo, y el UAC vuelve a abrir el caso.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Después de un asesino en serie es ejecutado en Oklahoma, un imitador aparece y los agentes del FBI son llamados para encontrarlo. Al mismo tiempo, Prentiss se pone nerviosa pensando en una importante compra inmobiliaria.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC presenta uno de los casos más longevos de un asesino en serie a unos estudiantes universitarios, y llevan la clase a través de los 20 años en los que persiguieron al asesino.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Un reservista naval de alta seguridad es encontrado muerto. Gibbs colabora con la Dra. Samantha Ryan de PsyOps para descubrir la verdad detrás del posible suicidio. Mientras tanto, DiNozzo discute con contabilidad tras ver el salario de McGee.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: El equipo investiga el asesinato de un suboficial principal, creyendo que está relacionado con un traficante de armas internacional.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: El secretario de la Marina asigna a Gibbs a trabajar con la Dra. Samantha Ryan después de que información secreta haya sido filtrada desde adentro.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: El cuñado del director Vance es el principal sospechoso cuando Gibbs y el equipo de NCIS investigan el asesinato de un marinero.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Apuesta alta
programme.desc: Cuando el hermano de Linda, Jimmy (Kevin Dillon), se mete en problemas con la mafia, le suplica a Danny que lo ayude a mantenerse a salvo hasta que la situación se calme

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): La sombra de la duda
programme.desc: Jamie y Eddie investigan cuando una mujer sufre una reacción alérgica a su medicación y descubren que su esposo, un técnico de emergencia, no respondió a la llamada de emergencia pese a estar asignado para hacerlo.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Un triste adiós
programme.desc: Danny investiga las circunstancias de la desaparición de una ex oficial de la Policía de Nueva York que desaparece al día siguiente de revelarle que planeaba hacer las paces con la mujer que ella y su compañero condenaron injustamente años atrás.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Amor perdido
programme.desc: Erin se enfrenta en la corte a su exesposo, Jack (Peter Hermann), quien está defendiendo al hombre que ella intenta condenar por asesinato. Mientras tanto, Danny y Baez investigan para determinar si el esposo está detrás del asesinato de su esposa.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Después de un asesino en serie es ejecutado en Oklahoma, un imitador aparece y los agentes del FBI son llamados para encontrarlo. Al mismo tiempo, Prentiss se pone nerviosa pensando en una importante compra inmobiliaria.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A bewildered driver claims that he did not see the lights or hear the sirens when he was signaled to stop. Officers investigate a call regarding a suspicious parked car. A manager of an apartment complex is assaulted by their intoxicated tenants.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A sibling reluctantly called authorities when his belligerent brother refused to leave his mother's home. Officers respond to a shoplifting call at a local grocery store. Officers investigate a suspicious vehicle parked at a local gas station.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An officer coordinates a reverse-prostitution sting designed to capture suspects who solicit prostitutes. An inebriated man is detained until he sobers up. Officers stop a vehicle which was reported stolen.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers encounter an unusual situation where the victim and suspect have barricaded themselves inside the house. Officers respond to a domestic dispute at a nearby apartment complex. A man explains how his ex-girlfriend climbed into his window.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A young girl may be the victim of a sexual assault. An officer spots a speeding motorcycle and attempts a routine stop. Officers serve a violation of domestic violence warrant on an inebriated guest at a local hotel.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A vehicle tries to force an off-duty deputy off of the road. An officer responds to a domestic disturbance call involving a woman and her husband's potential lover. A hostile man is out-of-control at a local residence.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: At the conclusion of an extensive pursuit, the driver eventually loses control of the vehicle and runs into a stop sign. With the aid of stop sticks, a driver’s car becomes disabled. Officers stop a stolen vehicle leaving a drug house.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A driver takes several units on a reckless journey on the wrong side of the highway. Officers sets up a reverse sting operation designed to capture a suspected drug dealer. Officers decide to pull over a driver who intentionally avoided a road block.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: The victim of the home invasion robbery tells a dispatch operator that a man held him at gun-point. A man in a wheelchair is in a stand-off with campus police. Officers respond to a call about a knife-wielding assailant.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: When one of the officers attempts to grab a suspect, the suspect unexpectedly assaults the officer in an attempt to avoid arrest. An officer responds to a stabbing. An officer is flagged down by a concerned group looking for a missing child.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Following a brief pursuit, the desperate driver bails out of the vehicle and flees on foot. An officer responds to an assault call. When a dog owner returns home, she's informed of her dog's mayhem and given a verbal warning and citation.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers pursue a vehicle traveling up to 100mph on a local freeway. An officer is dispatched to a larceny in progress at a local convenience store. A man threatens an elderly woman at their residence.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A female victim tells the officers that two men kicked in her front door. Three suspects attempt to steal a bicycle in an alley. Following routine questioning of a petrified wife, officer arrests the husband for domestic abuse.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A desperate driver attempts to flee on foot. Officers investigate a complaint in front of a local convenience store. Officers coordinate a sting designed to apprehend suspects who patronize prostitutes.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A chase ends when one of the police units successfully performs a pit maneuver which eventually disables the vehicle. An officer responds to a domestic dispute between a mother and her son. Officers attempt to pull over a vehicle with expired tags.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers coordinate a prostitution sting. Officers pull over a vehicle with a missing license plate. Officers stop a woman driving a stolen vehicle.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers are involved in a high-speed pursuit of suspected larcenists. Officers order occupants out of a vehicle and immediately give the driver a sobriety test. Officers report to a call of a dispute in a neighborhood.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Three male suspects are apprehended for solicitation. Officers respond to a domestic violence call at a nearby apartment complex. An officer is alarmed when she discovers an older male is the boyfriend of a teenager.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A decoy vehicle is strategically abandoned in a public parking lot. An officer responds to a burglary in progress call at a local tire store. Officers respond to a domestic call at a nearby trailer park.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers investigate two vehicles involved in an accident. Officers respond to a call involving a man with a knife. Officers respond to a call involving a man with a gun at a nearby convenience store.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A vehicle is caught traveling in the opposite direction. A sting operation is designed to nab suspects who attempt to purchase narcotics. Officers respond to a shoplifting call at a local thrift store.

programme.title: COPS

programme.desc: La escena del crimen era especialmente violenta: un esposo y una esposa fueron asesinados a tiros en su habitación. ¿Fue cómplice su hija de 16 años?

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Cuando la policía encuentra el cuerpo de Krista Harrison, de 11 años, hay pocas pistas sobre la identidad del asesino. Pero las autoridades están intrigadas por las inusuales fibras naranjas incrustadas en la ropa que se encuentran cerca de la víctima.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1997, se encontró el carro de Kelly Eckart, con todas sus pertenencias aún dentro del mismo, después de haber trabajado un turno nocturno en Franklin, Indiana. Días más tarde, se encontró su cuerpo en un barranco aislado.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Después de una Convención de Filadelfia, 180 legionarios contraen síntomas similares a la neumonía y 29 de ellos mueren. La determinación de un científico ayuda a identificar la causa de esta enfermedad mortal.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Después de que aparecen 10 cuerpos en Florida, una víctima – Lisa McVey de 17 años de edad – es secuestrada pero liberada. Ella lleva a la policía al autor del crimen, Bobbie Joe Long.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Timothy Wilson Spencer fue identificado como el hombre que violó y estranguló a cinco jóvenes mujeres en Virginia. Con el uso de perfiles de ADN, se libera a un hombre inocente y se condena al verdadero asesino.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Cuando una niña de 11 años desapareció de un pequeño pueblo en un área remota de Alaska, los investigadores se preguntaron si había sido atacada por un oso o se había perdido en los densos bosques.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Sombra de duda
programme.desc: Una mujer es asesinada a tiros en su tienda solo un día antes de testificar contra el hombre acusado de robarla.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Una estudiante de último año de la universidad fue violada y asesinada cerca de un sendero sin pavimentar utilizado por los estudiantes para caminar de un lado del campus al otro.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Una mujer joven de repente se enferma gravemente y, finalmente, no puede caminar. Una prueba de médula ósea revela la causa: arsénico.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Las cámaras de seguridad en un casino rastrearon los movimientos de una joven poco antes de que desapareciera. Nunca se le volvió a ver, pero a través de la evidencia que dejó, pudo decírsele a los investigadores qué le sucedió y quién fue el responsable.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Pelo de perro
programme.desc: Sin evidencia forense dentro de la escena del crimen, los investigadores estaban desconcertados. Pero sospecharon que el perro de la víctima había sido testigo del crimen.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Dentro de un cabello
programme.desc: Una mirada retrospectiva al caso del violador de River Park, que asaltó a cuatro mujeres en South Bend, Indiana, durante 1996. Los agentes del orden arrestaron a Richard Alexander, quien fue declarado culpable en 1998 y sentenciado a 70 años de prisión.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Intrusión bienvenida
programme.desc: Un hombre le dice a la policía que le disparó a un intruso que había atacado y asesinado a su esposa. El marido pinta un cuadro trágico y es apodado héroe.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Cuando una niña de 9 años desaparece, la policía y los voluntarios pasan semanas buscándola.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Una mordidita
programme.desc: En la escena de un crimen, los investigadores encuentran una huella de zapato, varios pelos extraños y huellas dactilares desconocidas.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The DCC take the field for the first time in their signature DCC boots. Learning the DCC entrance proves very challenging for some, while others struggle to get accustomed to dancing in cowboy boots. Melissa Rycroft is featured.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The recruits do media training with NBC 5 Dallas-Fort Worth lead news anchors Meredith Land, Kelli, and Judy name two triangle points, and guest judge Melissa Rycroft sits in.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The ladies put their modeling skills to the test on photoshoot day, Julia tries to bounce back after her car accident, and the dancers get a lesson in healthy cooking.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: With one week until the start of the season, Kelli and Judy make a tough cut, the show group performs for the first time, and Charlotte Jones Anderson judges rehearsal.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: To make their final cut, Kelli and her team try to find one hopeful of the remaining 37 who isn't ready to perform at the Cowboys' home opener.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: After an unusual online audition process, the rookie candidates for the 2020 squad move into an isolated training camp bubble amid the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The 20 rookies try to master a socially distanced version of the famous kick line and some intricate choreography, and Kelli helps the ladies get fitted for uniforms.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Guest choreographers test the rookies with new routines, the veterans arrive at camp determined to earn back their spots, and country star Mickey Guyton has inspiring words for the hopefuls.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The pressure's on for rookies and vets as the hopefuls head to the stadium for their first field rehearsal, and Kelli and Judy must decide which women won't move on in training camp.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The rookies outshine the veterans when choreographer Travis Wall teaches a sexy dance number, and Kelli and Judy give some of the vets a wake-up call.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The dancers get a chance to showcase their unique talents during show group auditions, and Kelli and Judy deliberate with guest judges to select the elite squad.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The dancers test their ability to think on their toes during a series of mock-press interviews, and as auditions wind down, a shocking bit of news shakes up the process for Kelli and Judy.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Kelli and Judy make cuts via video chat after a positive test for COVID-19 halts camp, Charlotte Jones hands out the iconic uniforms, and the team performs its game-day entrance.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: As 51 rookies and veterans arrive to chase their dreams, the candidates hope to prove their talent with a standout solo performance and take on the kick line in the Judges' Showcase.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: The murder of former NBA star and hometown hero Lorenzen Wright sends shockwaves through the city of Memphis; insiders speak out about new developments in the lengthy search for justice.

programme.title: Dateline NBC

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A woman's death is initially ruled a suicide, but when a new investigation begins, police begin to suspect murder.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Nearly 40 years after a high school senior is found stabbed to death in her car after visiting the mall days before Christmas, investigators identify the killer.

programme.title: Dateline NBC

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: The disappearance of a young woman from Bend, Ore., leads to an intense manhunt after the suspect embarks on a two state crime spree.

programme.title: Dateline NBC

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: The discovery of an Army captain's death in her El Paso, Texas, home shakes her tight-knit military community.

programme.title: I Love New York: Who's Got Game
programme.desc: New York is down to her lucky 7 and wants to know which guys have skills on the court. She's lookin' for a baller.

programme.title: I Love New York: Momma Said Knock You Out
programme.desc: The 6 guys gather in the living room when New York tells them that they will be hosting a party for her girls while she goes shopping. The guys' excitement turns to terror when ten screaming 11-year-old girls run in the front door.

programme.title: I Love New York: Guess Who's Coming To Dinner
programme.desc: New York decides to do a background check on the remaining 5 guys so she invites their ex-girlfriends to a day at the spa. While the guys sweat it out at the mansion, their ex's give NY and her mom all the dirt they want to know.

programme.title: I Love New York: Gettin' Hot In The Desert
programme.desc: New York wants to get to know the guys better so she takes them on 2 separate overnight double dates to Palm Springs. At the end of each night, she chooses one special guy to join her in her room for a nightcap.

programme.title: I Love New York: Momma's Boys
programme.desc: All 3 guys have met New York's mom, now it's her turn to meet theirs. The guys and their moms do their best to impress NY and Sister Patterson but they are tough ladies.

programme.title: I Love New York: The Final Adios
programme.desc: After the last elimination, New York tells her final 2 men to pack their bags because they're goin' to Playa Car, Mexico for an exotic getaway!

programme.title: Wife Swap UK
programme.desc: This week a mum who believes in structure and routine for her three children swaps with a mum who puts fun first and education last.

programme.title: Wife Swap UK
programme.desc: This week two Christian wives with a difference swap lives for two weeks. How will the strict Christian wife of a pastor cope living as a born again Christian with no rules who gambles and drinks?

programme.title: Wife Swap UK
programme.desc: From opposite sides of the pond, a traditional housewife who lives in rural Devon swaps lives with a modern mum who often spends two days a week away from her family working as a glamour model.

programme.title: Wife Swap UK
programme.desc: Marbella socialite Anna Courtenay and her husband Chris swap places with 'back to nature' Dan and Kara Darby-Dhyan who live on an eco friendly boat.

programme.title: Wife Swap UK
programme.desc: In one of the most extreme lifestyle swaps ever, a millionaire's wife who lives a luxurious lifestyle exchange lives with a freegan Jesus Christian who scavenges for food from bins!

programme.title: Wife Swap UK
programme.desc: What happens when a lively mum of eight who doesn't believe in rules swaps with a strict young mum of two?

programme.title: Wife Swap UK
programme.desc: What happens when a blind mum who runs a strict home swaps with a liberal mum who leads a hectic life?

programme.title: Wife Swap UK
programme.desc: Expect fireworks in this week's dramatic Wife Swap, as things don't quite go to plan when a mother of ten swaps lives with a career mum who runs a sweet shop.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The corridors of Degrassi have become a pressure cooker. With an unexpected influx of students from Lakehurst, Degrassi students find themselves facing old enemies and new friends.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Abstinence-pledged Darcy wakes up in a strange bed, screamingly hung-over. Panic-stricken, she tries to piece together the events of the night before. She knows – physically – she had sex, but everything else is a blank.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Fiona and Imogen scheme to end Marisol’s Student Council reign. The plan? Throw an unforgettable end-of-semester Degrassi holiday carnival. But with a huge family crisis looming, Fiona worries she may have over-promised.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Fiona and Imogen scheme to end Marisol’s Student Council reign. The plan? Throw an unforgettable end-of-semester Degrassi holiday carnival. But with a huge family crisis looming, Fiona worries she may have over-promised.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The holiday season is fast approaching and the Jeremiah house is abuzz - Angela has her upcoming Christmas skating pageant, Craig and Ashley are a serious item, and Joey and Sydney are getting serious.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The holiday season is fast approaching and the Jeremiah house is abuzz - Angela has her upcoming Christmas skating pageant, Craig and Ashley are a serious item, and Joey and Sydney are getting serious.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Things are back on track for Emma now that she’s officially over Sean. Chris has even asked her out! But when she hears rumours that Sean’s part of a gang stealing things from Degrassi (including Mr. Simpson’s laptop)

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It’s a big gymnastics meet at Degrassi, and Manny’s going to lead the team to gold! But when she starts to feel sick, she fears that her queasy stomach might be more than the flu or even a bad nerves.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Manny’s tempted by the romantic family scenario Craig paints and begins to think she and Craig really could keep this baby. Even Ashley shares the news with the entire cafeteria.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Five kids from different worlds are stuck in a room -- on a Saturday! When Raditch introduces Saturday detention, Sean, Ellie, Hazel, Jimmy and Toby are the first inductees.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Just when Terri thought she’d gotten over her ex boyfriend, Rick, he makes a concerted effort to win back her affections. She and her friends are wary – after all, leopards can’t change their spots.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Craig’s determined that he and the guys will be the “Last Band Standing” at Degrassi’s battle of the bands and win a spot on the show. So he sets the guys a fierce practice schedule and starts to write a killer new song.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The year-end Junior Formal is fast approaching, and Marco is in charge, except when it comes to a date. Problem is, Marco’s too nervous to ask Dylan out at all, let alone ask him to the prom.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: A stressed-out Paige and Spinner decide they need a break and skip school for the day. Ashley, meanwhile, is in the doldrums, too “sick” to go to school. So when Ashley calls Paige to get her homework, Paige decides Ash needs to join them in a little fun.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Once again, as things finally start to come together for Sean, the other shoe drops - his brother and guardian, Tracker, has found a new job in Alberta. Sean thinks his life is over until he finds out that he can legally live on his own.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The year end semi-formal is only hours away and Marco has transformed the gym into an idealized Bombay. It promises to be an amazing event, except Marco’s theme is causing tension between him and Ellie. Ellie finds the whole idea racist

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It’s the end of summer and Paige receives some unexpected news - her rape case has finally made it to trial and she’s the star witness. Finally…justice!

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Shocked by the outcome of the trial, Paige holes up in her room. But when Marco is able to coax her out to party at Dylan’s dorm with the gang, things go from bad to worse when she and Spinner have a blow-out fight.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Marco’s a shoo-in for Student Council President until Alex enters the race. While at first Alex seems an unlikely candidate, her strong opinions and anti-establishment platform take hold with the students and Marco realizes she might well win.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Feeling ignored on Student Council, Emma finds a way to get her voice heard when she takes up a new cause - ganging up with the cool kids to keep Terri’s abusive ex-boyfriend Rick, out of Degrassi.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Things are going great for Sean and Ellie, Degrassi’s most unlikely couple—so well that Sean asks Ellie to move in. Despite their closeness, Ellie hesitates and Sean doesn’t understand why.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: In her quest to repay Spinner for damage to his car, Alpha Paige has gone all beta. Suddenly, Spin’s using his new-found powers to zap whatever self-confidence Paige has left.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Rick decides to get back at his bullies, hitting them right where it hurts – their cars. But when Jimmy becomes a member of the “Whack Your Brain” team, the two form a truce.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Rick returns to Degrassi after the “Whack Your Brain” debacle at the hands of Spinner, Jay, and Alex. Toby and Mr. Raditch try to convince him to take the afternoon off, to go home and cool off, but an oddly calm Rick chooses to stay.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After the shooting at Degrassi, the full school board counseling response team moves in. And so does the media. Local reporter, Rachel Roberts, has decided to make Sean the hero of her piece.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Craig has a problem – the recording deal he and his band won last year is about to expire, but “Downtown Sasquatch” is nowhere near ready to record. With Jimmy in the hospital, they’re missing a key member.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Craig’s back with Ashley and he’s determined not to screw it up this time.

programme.title: Tutankhamun: Life, Death and Legacy
programme.desc: Dan meets the mummies of Tutankhamun's parents at the Egyptian Museum in Cairo, and discovers that they were actually brother and sister. CT scans reveal how this incestuous relationship could have been responsible for Tutankhamun's poor health.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog knows that looks can be deceiving. The fugitive is pretty, petite, and trouble. She stands accused of settling an argument with the help of a box cutter. What Dog does not anticipate is how deceptive this femme fatale can truly be!

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: What do you do when you have a fugitive you not only want to find, but believe can be helped back onto the straight and narrow? If you're Mary Ellen, you call your good friend Dog.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Duty calls and the Chapmans are off on a hunt. The team chases a fugitive who has disappeared into a world of "no known" addresses.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When Beth returns to the compound on the Big Island, she finds a damaged SUV and two possible culprits--Dog or Justin. Pressed by Beth, Dog offers a third option. The perpetrators are Hawaii's mythical mischief makers--the Menehune!

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: It's been quite a while since Tim Chapman put down his mace can and bulletproof vest to care for his growing family. When his old friend Dog calls asking for help tracking an elusive felon, Tim jumps into action.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: With the aid of the runner's girlfriend, the posse heads out to bring a client with a checkered past in. Little does the team suspect that before the end of the day, Dog will be helping to mend a family torn apart by violence.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog tracks a fugitive who is on the run from the law for the first time. Reading the file Dog knows the young man's life is at the crossroads. Will he be able to track down this wanna-be-gansta in time to convince him to make the right choice?

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: For a guy who started life as a free spirited outlaw-biker, Dog has certainly turned into a family man. His children touch everything he does today, from searching for the perfect gift for his daughter Cecily's birthday to hunting a fugitive.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: The hunt for an elusive and clever criminal takes Dog through the world of a bantam fighting cock, a pregnant daughter, and a jungle safe house go together. And don't forget the mopeds as well as a group of hostile squatters on government land!

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: What's a father to do? When the cops ask Dog for help tracking down a renegade teen with a history of running hard, Baby Lyssa, eight months pregnant and counting, insists on joins the hunt. Can Dog keep his daughter safe and catch his man?

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: For Dog and Beth, it's not only another day in paradise, it's their anniversary. Beth is hoping for a romantic dinner with her man, but she knows only too well that for Dog work always comes first.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Today Dog finds himself looking for more than one fugitive. He starts the day looking for a woman who has skipped out on her court date. But he soon learns that she has teamed up with a woman whose criminal exploits have attracted the local media.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog gave a break to a young man with a drug problem who promised to enter drug rehab. But this commitment to rehabilitation seems to have ended when he bolted from the car on the way to the drug treatment center and went on the run.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's latest fugitive doesn't think small when it comes to illegal drugs: he was carrying almost a pound of meth when he was arrested. Now he's on the run with his pregnant girlfriend on the high plains of Colorado.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When Dog decides to spend the day caring for his newest granddaughter, Beth enlists the girls to hunt down a female fugitive. Heading into a dangerous part of town, the ladies will use their feminine wiles to track this mother gone wrong.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and his old friends, Tim Chapman and Sonny Westbrook are riding with the team, so their target, a thief with violent tendencies, is out of luck. When Dog learns that the fugitive is also a disrespectful son, he is more motivated to find his man.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter

programme.desc: Krystle suspects Alexis knows the reason for Jeff's illness; Blake tries to prevent Alexis' proposed merger; Jeff is released from the hospital and Kirby reveals her feelings for him.

programme.desc: A street dealer's life spins out of control after he borrows money from his supplier.

programme.title: Black Christmas
programme.desc: An escaped maniac returns to his childhood home on Christmas Eve, which is now a sorority house.

programme.title: The Boondock Saints
programme.desc: Two vigilante brothers try to wipe out Boston's criminal underworld. Willem Dafoe and Norman Reedus star.

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs
programme.desc: Quentin Tarantino's debut film about a heist gone awry, leading the criminals to suspect one of their own.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time at Christmas
programme.desc: A teen and a young cop must stop a serial-killer couple dressed as Santa and Mrs. Claus terrorizing a town.

programme.desc: A crime boss tries to make off with loot that belongs to another thief.

programme.title: Sharknado
programme.desc: A hurricane floods LA, unleashing sharks that take over and terrorize the waterlogged city.

programme.title: 100 latinos dijeron
programme.desc: Dos familias competirán respondiendo a distintas preguntas por la oportunidad de ganar dinero basados en las respuestas más populares, de acuerdo a las previamente respondidas por 100 latinos alrededor de Estados Unidos.

programme.title: Tengo talento, mucho talento Kids
programme.desc: Los niños entre 6 y 12 años llegan con el objetivo de demostrar sus habilidades en el canto, la danza, la actuación, la música, y más.

programme.title: Alarma TV
programme.desc: Programa que muestra fenómenos inexplicables, desastres humanos y naturales sin censura.

programme.title: 100 latinos dijeron
programme.desc: Dos familias competirán respondiendo a distintas preguntas por la oportunidad de ganar dinero basados en las respuestas más populares, de acuerdo a las previamente respondidas por 100 latinos alrededor de Estados Unidos.

programme.title: Tengo talento, mucho talento Kids
programme.desc: Los niños entre 6 y 12 años llegan con el objetivo de demostrar sus habilidades en el canto, la danza, la actuación, la música, y más.

programme.title: Alarma TV
programme.desc: Programa que muestra fenómenos inexplicables, desastres humanos y naturales sin censura.

programme.title: Minuto para ganar
programme.desc: Una hora, 10 desafíos, un gran premio, y el afamado conductor Marco Antonio Regil mantendrán a la audiencia pegada a sus sillas mientras los concursantes utilizan artículos de uso diario encontrados en la mayoría de los hogares.

programme.title: Noches con Platanito
programme.desc: Un talk show cómico, diferente y entretenido con Platanito, quien entrevistará a importantes personajes de la farándula, concursos y rutinas de comedia.

programme.title: Juana Gallo
programme.desc: El padre y el novio de una joven son asesinados por órdenes de un coronel y ella incita al pueblo a la Revolución.

programme.title: Retofamosos
programme.desc: Seis famosos son reunidos en una azotea para enfrentar los retos más atrevidos, graciosos, chuscos y hasta arriesgados en donde el glamour y la fama se quedan atrás para dar paso a la diversión y el buen humor.

programme.title: Lagrimita y Costel
programme.desc: Grandes comediantes presentan lo mejor del entretenimiento, junto a grandes nombres de la música, en un show dinámico y loco.

programme.title: A que no puedes
programme.desc: Emocionante juego que enfrenta a dos equipos de celebridades en su intento por realizar pruebas y retos únicos. El equipo que complete con éxito la tarea, ganará dinero para una obra de ayuda social.

programme.title: Mi sueño es bailar
programme.desc: Celebridades ayudan a los participantes a hacer sus sueños realidad. Durante cada episodio la pareja con más puntos obtiene la oportunidad de escoger cual sueño se hará realidad.

programme.title: Formula 1 Racing
programme.desc: From July 26, 2025.

programme.title: Formula 1 Racing
programme.desc: The Formula One World Championship resumes with the Belgian Grand Prix from Circuit de Spa-Francorchamps. Lando Norris won in Austria and the United Kingdom to pull within eight points of McLaren teammate and championship leader Oscar Piastri.

programme.title: Formula 1 Racing
programme.desc: The Formula One grid cruises into the summer break with the Hungarian Grand Prix from the Hungaroring. McLaren driver Oscar Piastri, last year's winner in Hungary, increased his championship lead over teammate Lando Norris with a victory in Belgium.

programme.title: Formula 1 Racing
programme.desc: From Aug. 31, 2025.

programme.title: Formula 1 Racing
programme.desc: The Formula One grid rolls into Monza Circuit for the Italian Grand Prix. Oscar Piastri collected his seventh checkered flag of the year, and McLaren its 12th, at the Dutch Grand Prix on Aug. 31. Ferrari's Charles Leclerc won this race in 2024.

programme.title: Formula 1 Racing
programme.desc: From Sept. 21, 2025.

programme.title: El Chiringuito
programme.desc: El mejor debate y análisis de LaLiga, dirigido por Josep Pedrerol y su equipo de especialistas.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: A cynical Alex finds the spirit of Christmas in a dream.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Alex anxiously awaits a crucial college recommendation from his English teacher.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: On his 18th birthday, Alex defies his mother and goes off with some of his buddies to celebrate at an out-of-town nightclub.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Alex is both amazed and furious when a critical admissions interview at Princeton University is shattered by his hysterical sister Mallory.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Elyse is shocked by her soon-to-be-divorced mother's quick and free-spirited plunge into the singles world.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Alex discovers that his idol, young Uncle Ned, has a serious drinking problem.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Alex pretends to support the Equal Rights Amendment to impress a pretty feminist.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Mallory turns to Alex for some advice when she begins to fear she'll lose her new boyfriend unless she agrees to his pleas for a more "adult" romance.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Alex courts disaster when he invites two dates to the senior prom. He devises an elaborate scheme for escorting each of the unknowing girls on a night to remember.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Elyse is excited at the prospect of reviving her folk-singing career at a local nightclub.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: When Alex's pal Skippy discovers he's adopted, Alex helps him cope with the shocking news.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Alex is so sure that he will be named valedictorian of his class that he can't cope with the thought of being defeated by a girl-especially his girl.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: In the hospital awaiting a tonsillectomy, Jennifer fears she may never see her family again.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Elyse feels the need to expand her horizons.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: When Elyse has a convention speech in 'fascinating east coast resort' Atlantic City, she didn't plan to waste any time and money gambling.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: The news that their mother is pregnant sends the three Keaton kids into an angry outburst resulting in a family battle.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Alex is thrilled to be taking a college course taught by one of his personal heroes, Professor Ephraim Bronski. In his eagerness to impress the teacher he gets off to a bad start and is humiliated by his idol when he fails the first-class assignment.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Little Jennifer is thrilled about getting a visit from her former neighborhood pal, Scott, whom she hasn't seen in five years.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Alex reluctantly accepts a part-time job with his father at the non-profit station, and his dad is bursting with pride to have him following in his footsteps.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Mallory's enthusiasm for her part-time job at a boutique causes her grades to slip even lower than usual.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: As an economics student, Alex finds it demeaning to be forced into a public service position, but his experiences at the crisis center give him a new outlook on life.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: While Steven and Elyse are away on vacation, Mallory accidentally crashes her parents' car into a telephone pole. The kids need to raise money for auto repairs and decides to turn the Keaton house into a hotel.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Alex cannot accept the fact that he and everyone around him are growing up and desperately clings to his old ways.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Steven and Elyse plan a nostalgic weekend with the kids before the baby arrives, and are crushed to discover that the children are not at all interested in reminiscing about old times-they'd rather be with their friends.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Alex plays Cupid to help his shy pal Skippy get together with Jane, the girl of his dreams, but his good intentions go awry when the girl falls for him instead.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Steven gets depressed from interviewing frightfully inept candidates as housekeeper-nanny for the baby, such as a child-hater ad an ex-con.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Alex's chances for acceptance into a smug college fraternity are dependent upon him having a knockout date for the pledge dance.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: The money bubble has burst, but for seasoned pro Ole Schemion-who has earned over $5 million in Monte Carlo alone-a minimum cash isn't enough. He faces a formidable challenge from French star Gaëlle Baumann and online legend Jussi Nevanlinna.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: PSPC champion Ramon Colillas surges into the top five as just 40 players remain in the EPT Monte Carlo Main Event. Day 3 intensifies as competitors battle to reach the final two tables.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: The field narrows to just 16 survivors, including EPT Dublin champion Niall Farrell and PSPC winner Ramon Colillas. With over €41,000 already locked up, the stakes couldn't be higher as players fight for their place at the final table of nine.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Nine players remain, but only six will advance to the final day with a shot at nearly €1 million and poker immortality. Can PSPC champion Ramon Colillas extend his remarkable run to another major final table, or will his epic journey end?

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: The moment of truth arrives at the EPT Monte Carlo final table. Six players-two businessmen, one qualifier, and three seasoned professionals-wage the ultimate battle for almost €1 million and the coveted EPT trophy.

programme.title: PDC Darts Classics
programme.desc: FanDuel TV Extra is your new home for live sports, professional poker action, and betting insight. Watch and wager in real-time on horse racing, international basketball, soccer, and much more. Make every moment more with FanDuel!

programme.title: PokerStars Players Championship
programme.desc: Shuffle up and deal! The biggest $25k buy-in poker tournament in history sees more than 1,000 players - amateurs, pros and sports stars - come to the Bahamas to compete for a first prize of more than $5m.

programme.title: PokerStars Players Championship
programme.desc: NBA star Paul Pierce and UFC announcer Bruce Buffer are among the celebrities taking to the poker tables in the Bahamas, as Day 1 of the biggest High Roller tournament in history continues.

programme.title: PokerStars Players Championship
programme.desc: Phil 'The Poker Brat' Hellmuth takes centre stage on Day 2 of the biggest $25k poker tournament ever held. Pro players, amateurs and celebrities compete for a share of the $26m prize pool.

programme.title: PokerStars Players Championship
programme.desc: More action from the Bahamas, where hundreds of amateur players who've qualified for free are taking on their poker heroes. British pros Sam Grafton and Benjamin 'Spraggy' Spragg are among those chasing the $5.1m first prize.

programme.title: PokerStars Players Championship
programme.desc: It's bubble time in the Bahamas! The moment approaches when players in the biggest $25k poker tournament in history start sharing the $26m prize pool. But a few will miss out on the money.

programme.title: PokerStars Players Championship
programme.desc: 1,000 players came to the Bahamas. Now, fewer than 150 remain. The spotlight is on the chip leaders, as amateurs, poker pros and a former Super Bowl winner eye the top prize of $5.1m.

programme.title: Dr. Quinn, Medicine Woman
programme.desc: A famous civil war photographer realizes he may be taking his last picture after Dr. Mike discovers that he is going blind.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: A Vietnam vet is denied government assistance, despite having lost a leg and an arm.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young couple decided to celebrate their first wedding anniversary with a camping trip to Mount Hood. During the trip, the husband was shot and killed. Later, his wife told two different versions of the events which led to his death.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The body of 16-year-old Leanne Tiernan was discovered nine months after she disappeared. Forensic scientists found clues that painted a virtual portrait of her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A beautiful young woman falls to her death from a cliff overlooking the ocean. Initially, investigators think it was a tragic accident. But after a forensic examination, police uncover a very different picture of what happened.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Haunted by the disappearance of her mother, a young woman undertakes an investigation of her own. In her mother's diary, she discovers a dark family secret that might explain the disappearance.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: California police had several suspects in the robbery and brutal murder of an elderly couple. Ten years later, a determined forensic scientist used material from a dentist's office to uncover ballistic evidence that had been overlooked.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After a street fight takes the life of a national wrestling champion, police must determine if he was killed in cold blood or in self-defense.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A 19-year-old woman was found dead in her car; the scene had been staged to make murder appear to be suicide. During their investigation, police discovered the victim was involved in a love quadrangle, giving several people a motive to kill her.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man disappears one year to the day after beginning an affair with his friend's wife. 15 years later, with the help of a metal detector, police find evidence that would prove what had happened and who was responsible.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When the body of a young woman is found under an isolated highway ramp, a unique fiber on the victim's clothing leads San Diego police straight to the most unlikely of killers.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A go-go dancer told her family she needed to get away for a while and then she simply disappeared. Investigators were suspicious, because she took neither her car nor her clothes. 20 years later, her family received a call that changed everything.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A Colorado hunter is the victim of a well-planned crime. Investigators suspect two weapons and two killers. But forensic evidence points them in a different direction — one much closer to home.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1984, California firefighters battled ten arson fires in three weeks. When cigarettes and a scrap of paper connected the case to similar fires further north, the hunt was on for a dangerous pyromaniac.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2002, a small community in upstate New York was devastated when Patty Wlasiuk died in a truck accident. But burdock seed pods found in her hair and on her clothes indicated that this was no accident — it was cold-blooded murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a woman disappeared without a trace, there were two possible explanations: kidnapping or murder. Careful investigation, a forensic artist and DNA profiling enabled police to find a single suspect, who was known to prey upon vulnerable women.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Alaskan hikers discover a body wrapped in sheets which were edged in orange stitching. Investigators find a tuft of red carpet fibers clinging to the sheet — threads of evidence which lead them straight to the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Prompted by news of a flight attendant's brutal murder, the son of a previous victim contacts police. Both murders have similar MOs, and biological evidence proves that these were serial killings.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A two-man shrimp boat sinks when a fast-moving, violent storm strikes the Louisiana coast. The captain drowns, but the deckhand is rescued fourteen hours later. The crewman is hailed as a hero — until the captain's body is discovered.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a wealthy real estate tycoon goes missing, it appears to be foul play. In his will, he leaves instructions in case he should die under violent circumstances — which were carried out after a hiker comes across his bullet-ridden skull.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The murder of an American tourist in a Mexican resort draws law enforcement resources on both sides of the border. At first glance, the motive appears to be robbery, but careful analysis of the forensic evidence points to something more sinister.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police are led on a wild goose chase when the wife of a prominent banker is kidnapped. An entomologist's unexpected discovery leads to a new suspect — and the realization that ordinary office equipment can leave extraordinary clues.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A neighbor watched as a man stabbed his wife, pushed her into the swimming pool and held her head under water. The husband, however, had no recollection of the crime. A jury would have to decide between evidence and the mysteries of the mind.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: It would take 46 years, handwriting analysis and new fingerprint technology to solve the 1957 murders of two California police officers.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man riding a bicycle was fatally injured in what police believed to be a hit-and-run accident. Tiny clues found at the scene created a picture of the vehicle which struck him and led police to its driver.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When an elderly couple died in a suspicious house fire, their son became the prime suspect. Investigators turned to forensic science to determine if the fire had been set deliberately, or if it was an unfortunate accident.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police instituted an intense search when the mother of two young children went missing. Twenty years after her body was found, new technology recontextualized old evidence and pointed directly to the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When hunters reported finding a skull in a Texas canyon, police immediately began an investigation. With a forensic artist's reconstruction, police eventually learned the victim's identity. Now all they had to do was find her killer.

programme.title: I Love Lucy

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: To celebrate the Mertzes' wedding anniversary, Fred and Ricky want to go to a prizefight, but the girls want to get dressed up and go to a nightclub. An argument ensues and Lucy threatens to find two other escorts if their husbands won't take them.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy decides Ricky's love is growing cold so she takes Ethel's advice she learned from a book, How to Keep the Honeymoon from Ending. Her attempt to dress up for breakfast doesn't yield any response from Ricky.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: One of the girls in Ricky's show quits, creating a vacancy which Lucy wants to fill. She goes down for an audition and can have the part provided she loses twelve ponds in four days to fit into the previous singer's size 12 outfit.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy is reading "The Mockingbird Murder Mystery" when Ethel reads her fortune and tells her death is near. Later she overhears a conversation between Ricky and his agent and she jumps to the wrong conclusion that he's trying to do away with her.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: When Ricky cuts off Lucy's allowance and charge accounts because of her careless spending, Lucy finds herself short of funds. Ethel has tickets to a radio quiz show that has a cash prize of $1,000.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Network television scouts are going to check out Ricky's band and Lucy tries to "get into the act" in order to be discovered as well. Of course Ricky will not hear of it.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy becomes interested in numerology and advises Ricky that it is a good day for him to make any deals he can. However, she soon realizes that she consulted the horoscope from yesterday's newspaper.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: When Ricky leaves his clothes around the living room, Lucy gets angry and divides the room in half so Ricky can be as messy as he likes - on his side!

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ricky brings home a $3,500 mink coat to be used in his nightclub act, and Lucy assumes it's her anniversary present. Trying to get the coat away from her becomes a problem because Lucy not only wears it while she does housework, she even sleeps in it.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ethel Mertz interprets a gossip column item to mean that Ricky is interested in one of the chorus girls in his nightclub. Ricky assures Lucy that it's just publicity.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy opens a telegram addressed to Ricky from the War Department ordering him to appear at the Army's Fort Dix. This letter plus the drills Ricky and Fred have been practicing in the living room convince the women that their husbands have been drafted.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy learns that Ricky needs a dancer for his Parisian nightclub act and is determined to get the part. Fred offers to teach her how to dance but Ethel arranges instead to have the nephew of the woman who runs the French laundry to give pointers.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ethel wants Ricky to headline a benefit for her women's club. Lucy will only try to arrange it if she is on the bill as well. After hearing Lucy's terrible singing voice, Ethel is less than eager, but eventually agrees.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy buys a costly dress, and when Ricky tells her to take it back or pay for it herself, she decides to get a job. She answers an ad for a babysitter and finds herself in charge of high-spirited twin boys who are to appear in an amateur contest.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy's neighbor Miss Lewis has a crush on Mr. Ritter, the local grocer but istoo shy to invite him to dinner. Trying to play Cupid, Lucy invites him for her but he gets the idea that Lucy has fallen for him. Apparently Mr. Ritter is fond of Lucy as well.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: In a deception planned to convince Ricky that she ought to be in his new nightclub act, Lucy pretends to have a nervous breakdown. She consults a book on abnormal psychology that reveals three complexes she assumes.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy decides to break into show business by writing a play about a Cuban tobacco picker and entering it in her women's club play competition. Of course she wants Ricky to star in it but he refuses.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: The Mertzes enjoy an evening singing around the piano with the Ricardos in their apartment. When they retire for the night and Lucy and Ricky continue singing, Ethel phones them demanding quiet.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ricky needs a ballet dancer and a burlesque comic for his club's new musical revue. Lucy wants the ballet gig and takes dance lessons from a strict instructor. Learning the disciplined art is much more difficult than she imagined.

programme.desc: Lucy and Ethel are eager to get a closer look at the belongings of the O'Briens, new neighbors in the building. They snoop around in their apartment while they are away and when they hear the O'Briens return, Lucy is trapped in the closet.

programme.desc: Los Lambreton son los encargados de organizar la fiesta navideña de este año en su casa, mientras que Don Sebas extraña a su país natal y piensa en regresar.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo despierta la curiosidad en el Noruego por conocer a su padre y este le pide ayuda a Gaspar para que lo acompañe en esta misión que ha hecho como su única prioridad. Mientras tanto el Abuelo encamina a Jonathan en su despertar sexual.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Viendo la tele en la sala de su casa de repente el Abuelo y el Noruego son golpeados con una nueva idea para lucrar en un popular programa de TV. Mientras tanto Peluzín se aventaja de un descuido de Gaspar.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo sufre un accidente y mientras esta al filo de la muerte revalora su vida desde sus inicios recordando una parte de su infancia, la que busca esclarecer una vez recuperada su salud.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo se topa de manera inesperada con su Némesis de la infancia y junto con Gaspar se embarca en una cruzada para recuperar un objeto muy preciado de manos de su archienemigo.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Este capitulo completo es una sátira de la típica historia de telenovelas que ha puesto a México en el mapa como el mas su fuerte exponente, sin reflejar necesariamente algún estándar de calidad.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego recibe una visita inesperada con una noticia que le cambiara la vida. Mientras tanto Jonathan le ayuda a Peluzín para prepararse para una prueba muy importante.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Una aparición religiosa se manifiesta en el baño del departamento y poco tardan el noruego y el abuelo en encontrarle una ventaja a esta situación.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo encuentra la manera de aprovecharse del sistema de seguros a costa de Peluzín. Mientras Gaspar les encarga al Noruego y a Jonathan que recojan en el aeropuerto a un familiar que viene de visita de los Estados Unidos.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Gaspar y el Abuelo sufren un accidente en el desayuno que les trae muchos problemas. Mientras Jonathan necesita el apoyo de su familia para una presentación en la escuela.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Una oda al prototipo de familia mexicana disfuncional, con el humor y gran atributo para enfrentar cualquier situación.

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: Get to the Heart: The Barbara Mandrell Story
programme.desc: This compelling portrait of country music star Barbara Mandrell looks at her early career, the car accident in 1984 that almost killed her and her ultimate recovery.

programme.title: High Lonesome - The Story Of Bluegrass Music
programme.desc: Night Flight Presents: High Lonesome traces the music and sounds from its Appalachian roots to the present. The rise; fall; and consistent revival of bluegrass chronicled through oral history and visual record.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Magician David Copperfield teaches Mister Rogers how to do a magic trick. It takes lots of practice. In Make-Believe, X is giving flying lessons, and there's a video of what the world looks like from a bird's point of view.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Prince Tuesday is upset about being unable to fly, so Lady Elaine gives him a propeller hat. He jumps off the castle wall, thinking the hat will make him fly, and injures his arm. Mister Rogers visits the Uptown String Quartet.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: X says he is feeling guilty about Prince Tuesday's fall. Neighbor Aber says it was not X's flying lessons that made Prince Tuesday get hurt. Mister Rogers shows a video about people making sleeping bags. He visits the workshop of the doll maker.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Hula-hoop expert Paul Tifford gives Mister Rogers some lessons. It takes a lot of practice to be able to use a hula-hoop well, and falling and getting up again are a part of learning!

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Instead of changing into a sweater as he typically does, Mister Rogers puts on a vest made by his friend Saihou Njie. Trolley brings a batik cloth to Handyman Negri, who then gives it to King Friday.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Mister Rogers arrives with a children's plastic potty, takes it to his bathroom and compares it to the adult-sized toilet. Prince Tuesday comes up with a game using a bucket but has had his feelings hurt when his father was not impressed.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: King Friday denounces the magic finder balloon. Neighbors Aber and Robert Troll are looking for Lady Elaine. They find her locked in a room of the Museum-Go-Round. At Mister Rogers' house, Levar Burton reads “The Daddy Book.”

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Mister Rogers explains how a wheelchair lift works, and then shows one in action. He shows some of his puppets. Mayor Maggie and Neighbor Aber ride in a wheelchair until they have their checkups from Dr. Bill.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Mister Rogers visits with Koko the gorilla, who has learned how to communicate in sign language. In Make-Believe, there's a gorilla, too, who seems scary until the neighbors get to know him. And there's a video of how people make play balls.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: At the eye doctor's office, Mister Rogers takes part in a general eye examination. The gorilla catches Lady Aberlin as she stumbles, which alarms Lady Elaine Fairchild. Lady Elaine is determined to catch the gorilla.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Mr. McFeely stops by with a film about a service dog aiding a handicapped child. Mister Rogers visits with the boy from the video and his dog. Lady Elaine Fairchile continues her efforts to catch the gorilla. Neighbor Aber is missing.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Mister Rogers reads a book about a dog named Zak. There's also a video visit to the Center for Creative Play, a place where children of all abilities can play.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Marilyn Barnett brings someone who has great talent with yo-yos. Mister Rogers shows a film of how people make wooden yo-yos. Prince Tuesday plays well with the yo-yo, but King Friday does not. Therefore, the king outlaws yo-yos.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Mister Rogers and Mr. McFeely ride with Maria Mancano on a helicopter. Miss Paulificate and Lady Aberlin have been assigned the duty of “yo-yo guard,” responsible for upholding the King's ban on yo-yos.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Mr. McFeely shows a photo album with pictures of Neighbors wearing different hats. Lady Aberlin informs King Friday that Lady Elaine's helicopter, Yo-Yo, is stuck in the air. King Friday commands that all references to yo-yos be removed.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Mister Rogers shows a video of inventor Chuck Hoberman with his sphere and a video of Yo-Yo and Nicholas Ma. The neighbors are waiting for Bob Dog's helicopter to land. They discover that the helicopter responds to guitar music.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Mister Rogers visits Maya Lin at her studio to see how she first makes small models of big things she is working on. They go to Penn Station to see what she created there. In Make-Believe, there's a video visit with cellist Yo-Yo Ma.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Mister Rogers sees a performance by the Westminster Bell Choir and shows how people make bells. Mayor Maggie has a bell that she plays with King Friday and gives to Henrietta as a doorbell. Daniel and H.J. Elephant dress up as astronauts.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Visiting a nearby dance studio, Mister Rogers watches a class of young students learning to use ribbons as part of their dance routine. Henrietta is still ringing her new bell and X the Owl is growing quite frustrated.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Percussionist Tim Adams performs. H.J. Elephant is dressed in his outerspace costume as he tells Lady Aberlin about pretending to fly to the moon. He makes a loud trumpet sound which causes alarm for X and Henrietta.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Mister Rogers shows a video of himself and Sylvia Earle snorkeling in the ocean. Lady Elaine says she is hiding from something they are afraid of from outer space. Mister Rogers suggests when something is scary on TV, turn it off.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Neighbor Aber places a costume on top of Trolley to participate in the upcoming parade. Prince Tuesday is collecting comforting messages for X the Owl and Henrietta Pussycat in hopes of drawing them out for the parade.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: With Don Krieg defeated, Luffy tries to convince Sanji to join up with the Straw Hats. The skilled cook is interested, but he has something to prove before moving on.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: With their culinary concerns in good hands, the Straw Hats set off in search of Nami – who’s on a collision course with a deadly foe!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zoro is captured by Fishman Arlong and learns a shocking secret about Nami. Unable to believe his ears, he puts the navigator to the ultimate test.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and his crew make their way towards Arlong Park and a showdown with its fishy proprietor. Along the way, they discover a treasure map that raises more questions about Nami.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: A fierce argument over where Nami’s loyalties lie divides the Straw Hat Pirates and only one thing’s for sure – no one is willing to risk their life for a traitor.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami’s adopted sister, Nojiko arrives to fill in some details about the skilled mapmaker’s younger days.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nojiko continues the story of Nami’s younger days. Back in the present, Nami gets agonizingly close to a long time goal, but betrayal looms on the horizon.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nezumi comes to confiscate Nami’s treasure, but who’s he working for? More importantly, who’s Nami working for, and what’s she gonna do with her booty?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats’ faith in Nami is restored, and now it’s time for a battle royal! Luffy and the gang are determined to make Arlong pay for mistreating their friend.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats and Arlong’s fishermen are locked in a swashbuckling slugfest, but things take a bad turn when Luffy gets trapped beneath the waves.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: While his friends work to free the captain of the Straw Hats, cowardly Usopp finds himself in a position to shed his yellow streak and make his father proud.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami must decide between letting Arlong maintain his hold over her, or joining the Straw Hats and leading the oppressed villagers against the tyrant Fishman.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Arlong better watch his back-fins, because Captain Luffy knows about all the horrible things he did to Nami – and it makes his blood boil.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Something about Nami’s former prison gives Luffy an added burst of strength. He’s so moved by her terrible past that he vows to destroy all of Arlong Park!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: After a grueling fight, Luffy defeats Arlong and succeeds in destroying his headquarters. The merry marauders enjoy the fruits of victory while Nami makes peace with her turbulent past.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Finally, the day has arrived where Luffy’s face is on an authentic wanted poster! Now there are enemies in hot pursuit as the crew makes waves for Logue Town – the final resting place of Gold Roger!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Buggy gets marooned on an island inhabited by unusual creatures and tangles with the island’s caretaker, Gaimon. If he is to finally destroy Luffy, Buggy must cast his lot with a mysterious woman.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Buggy Pirates fight each other for the right to take their lost captain’s place. While they’re busy beating each other’s brains out, a cannibalistic tribe makes plans to have something special for dinner.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats arrive at Logue Town, and each crewmember embarks upon a mission of a more personal nature. While his crew shops, Luffy goes in search of sacred ground.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy has a run-in with Captain Smoker, and his failure to keep a low profile helps Buggy draw a bead on him. Elsewhere, Zoro takes a chance that his skill can overcome a dangerous curse.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Usopp finds an amazing pair of sharpshooter’s goggles, but they lead to a run-in with Daddy the Parent – the greatest gunslinger ever! Now, the Straw Hat marksman is headed for the deadliest of all duels.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: A cooking competition with the fiery chef Carmen rekindles Sanji’s dreams of the legendary All Blue.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Buggy and his mysterious female ally trap Luffy on the same platform where Gold Roger was executed. He is to be killed for his offenses against Buggy, but Zoro and Sanji attempt a daring rescue mission.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: As a storm batters Logue Town, Buggy, Alvida, and Captain Smoker close in on Luffy for a stirring final showdown!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The discovery of a small girl adrift in an abandoned lifeboat interrupts Luffy and his crew’s voyage to the Grand Line.

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats want to return Apis’s dragon to his nest, but the Marines have them surrounded. Looks like it’s time for another daring escape!

programme.desc: Nikola Tesla sends a distress call to the team, and they track him to the Colombian highlands, where they encounter deadly multipedes. Meanwhile, Bigfoot and Kate learn that a long-time friend has been murdered in Old City.

programme.desc: Firefighters respond to a house fire and discover three gunshot victims inside; authorities pursue the heavily armed murderer through Christmas.

programme.desc: Morticia calls a psychiatrist after she fears Pugsley is becoming normal after he abandons his pet octopus for a puppy and is seen wearing a Boy Scout uniform, playing with a baseball bat, and helping an old lady cross the street.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester, who has become lonely, convinces Gomez and Morticia that it is time for him to find a bride. He decides to put an ad in the newspaper, looking for love. But things go awry when a door-to-door saleswoman comes by.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Election fever grips the Addams household, as Gomez (John Astin) supports the council candidate whose campaign promise is to drain the town's disgusting bogs. Morticia (Carolyn Jones), who likes "the lovely bogs," labels the candidate an extremist.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Wednesday's and Pugsley's faith in Santa Claus is shaken, Uncle Fester is chosen to back up Santa in case the real St. Nick is too busy to come. However, Fester-Santa gets stuck in the chimney, so each of the other adults fills in for him.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Pugsley befriends Gorgo, a circus gorilla, Gorgo decides to follow Pugsley and Gomez home, where is accepted as one of the family. But Gorgo gives Morticia's tea guests, the Ladies League members, quite a shock.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: A pair of bank robbers are welcomed as Halloween trick-or-treaters by Morticia and Gomez. The creepy atmosphere of the house, Morticia's smoldering holiday punch, and Lurch's ominous presence impel the crooks to abandon their plans.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Lionel Barker, a former suitor of Morticia's, shows up, Gomez is jealous. But he's soon calmed when he learns that Barker is after Mildred, the new maid. The Addamses then discover that Barker is a con man--after Mildred's money, not her love.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Newlyweds move in next door. But the honeymoon loses its tranquility when Uncle Fester enters their house through a tunnel and they flee in terror at the sight of Lurch, Grandmama sharpening her ax, and Morticia and Gomez bathing the octopus.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family faces a crisis when Wednesday packs her spider and runs away (after being scolded for playing with Uncle Fester's TNT). When they try to file a missing person report, a detective is anxious to retire early due to their story.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Official visitors from an unfriendly nation receive the shock of their lives when they decide to exploit the Addams Family as an average uncultured family. The visitors are shaken up by Morticia's carnivorous plants among other things.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's cousin, Melancholia, wants to marry Clarence P. Harvey after most of her marital prospects have joined the Foreign Legion. Clarence recoils when Melancholia puts on a campaign to win him, backed by Morticia, Gomez and Clarence's boss.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes a veritable gazelle when he takes dancing lessons at Gomez and Morticia's suggestion after he admits to being a wallflower at social functions. Each member of the Addams Family teaches Lurch a different step.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandmama's paintings leave an art critic speechless, so Gomez sends for his friend, Sam Picasso, to teach Grandmama to paint in the abstract. The starving artist ignores Grandmama's and Morticia's work as he eats and paints.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Rockland Cartright III is a beatnik who crashes his motorbike into a tree and recuperates at the Addams house. Each regards the other as an oddity, although the family learns to appreciate certain aspects of Rockland's life.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Mr. Briggs, the postman, is hired by the government to do undercover work in the Addams house. While pretending to be a stamp collector, he investigates rumors that coded radio messages are being sent from the house.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch's tiny fire-eating mother visits and demands that Lurch's employers wait on her boy hand-and-foot after Lurch leads her to believe that it's his house. Lurch revels in the unexpected attention he gets from Morticia and Gomez.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester's electrical output fails abruptly. Should they call a doctor or an electrician to bring Fester back? Morticia prescribes a bowl of porcupine mold, and both she and Gomez agree that long exposure to moon rays would be beneficial.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family would like to vacation on the moon, but the billion-dollar travel cost is slightly prohibitive. Uncle Fester volunteers $21.13 and Morticia, using Gomez's new supercomputer, suggests placing a $2,000 bet on the daily double horse race.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Cousin Itt is advocated as curator of the local zoo. Gomez uses his influence with Park Commissioner Fisk (guest star Alan Reed) to promote Itt for the job, but the zookeepers are convinced the Addamses' cousin should be confined to a cage.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandmama (Blossom Rock) is hauled off to jail for setting up a fortune-telling booth in the Addamses' living room. Gomez (John Astin) volunteers to act as attorney, and the court session becomes a shambles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez (John Astin) loses his memory after hitting his head; he fails to recognize Morticia (Carolyn Jones) and says the house looks like a condemned museum. The Addamses take turns hitting Gomez on the head trying to help him regain his memory.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Thing disappears from his box. Failing to find a single trace of Thing, Gomez (John Astin) conducts an investigation--with all members of the household under suspicion. Also starring Carolyn Jones, Jackie Coogan, and Ted Cassidy.
