programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: No matter how chaotic or how clean a crime scene appears to be, the culprit is bound to leave something telling behind. Occasionally, it's nothing more than a fingerprint or shoe tread. Sometimes that's all that's needed.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Killers often attempt to deflect attention away from their crimes by hiding the remains of their victims. Bodies may lay hidden for years before they are discovered.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: At a crime scene, anything left behind or seemingly out of place is considered a clue. But a fire can extinguish everything in its path –challenging forensic investigators at every turn and making each arson a trial by fire.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Hiding a body can be difficult; it's sometimes easier to obscure or disguise the circumstances of the death, turning murder into suicide, or pinning the blame on someone else. The truth is told through subtle clues taken from the crime scene.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: 911 receives a desperate call in Fort Worth, Texas. A man's wife is shot. Forensic investigators search for clues in unlikely places, hoping the victim herself could provide information needed to determine how and why she died.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: The Great Outdoors may offer great clues to solving brutal murders. But it takes the keen eye of the forensic entomologist and botanist to decipher the clues nature provides.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When victims of murder know their killers, they are often caught off guard. But even the best-laid plans leave traces of the forsaken trust.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Ballistics: A corpse is found with a gunshot wound to the head; the weapon lies next to the victim. It looks like suicide, but could it be murder? It's a question best solved by ballistics experts.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Stolen Youths
programme.desc: A young girl playing in her yard in Spokane, Washington suddenly vanishes. In St. Louis another girl leaves to visit a friend. She never arrives.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Forensics in the O.J. Simpson Murder Trial: Millions watched on television as the jury rendered their verdict. Orenthal James Simpson was found not guilty of murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: DNA Analysis: With the advent of DNA analysis, just a few microscopic cells found at a crime scene can be used to put a murder behind bars.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Psychological Profiling: Journey into the dark recesses and calculated madness present only in our worst nightmares…and in the minds of serial killers.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Black Boxes: Little evidence is left after an airplane takes a deadly plunge from the sky. Investigators' best hope for an answer comes from the flight data recorder known as a “black box.”

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: At the scene of a murder, sometimes the victim provides the only clues to their killer. Forensic anthropologists use skeletal remains to decipher the clues written in the bones.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: After Lucas kills a mountain man in a brawl, his father arrives in North Fork to break his other boys out of jail and take revenge on Lucas and Marshall Torrance.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Newly arrived gunslinger Al Walker throws a mammoth party at the saloon, keeping acting Marshall Ben Waller busy until Lucas is forced to intervene.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: After Lucas accuses a newspaper writer's misleading articles of causing an innocent man's death, the writer begins writing articles about Lucas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Gavin and Ezra Martin think that Lucas killed their son Clemmie while taking part in a train robbery and Lucas refuses to tell them what really happened.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Eddie's daughter causes trouble for Lucas when two strangers threaten her life after she arrives with criminal information and stolen money.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Town character Brett Conway blackmails Lucas with the knowledge that a young couple Lucas rescued is suffering from yellow fever.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark are stranded in the middle of a desert with very little food or water, and after Lucas is injured, Mark becomes the only hope for their survival.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: While trying to protect Banker Hamilton's gold, Mark is kidnapped and held hostage at the McCain ranch and will be killed within the hour unless Lucas cooperates.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas makes a life-or-death decision when Micah is held hostage and the kidnappers demand the release of a notorious outlaw.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas tries to do a good deed for the old town drunk but it backfires when the drunk's son believes he inherited Lucas' ranch.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A dance hall singer asks Lucas to care for her daughter in an effort to hide the baby from her self-righteous, bigoted father.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas becomes involved in a battle between an aspiring writer and a cocky, bragging trail boss.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark runs away from home after his father questions his story about overhearing a plot to rob the bank.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A famous buffalo hunter tries to goad Lucas into a shooting match. When Lucas refuses, he becomes the new target.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When a stranger arrives to marry the town spinster, two brothers who want her land try to discourage him with threats and a beating.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark finds himself in grave danger when two unscrupulous detectives searching for a man's long-lost son claim that it's Mark.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas is drawn to a young widow passing through town on her way to claim an inheritance but others who covet it are trying to kill her.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: After a young stablehand kills a notorious gunslinger, he is baffled by the hostility of the townspeople about giving him the reward.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When a horse dealer transporting a prize stallion stops in North Fork, two saddle tramps try to use trickery to obtain it.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An elderly couple moves to North Fork under an assumed name to hide the fact that they are the parents of a vicious killer. The plan backfires when the son shows up at their home.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: After foiling a girl's attempt to rob the general store, Lucas finds that she and her brother are plotting the murder of their abusive stepfather.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A condemned killer being transported by train murders a marshal and takes Mark hostage.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark discovers that the new preacher and his wife are impostors planning a robbery.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Marshall Torrance get into trouble with the Army when they try to help a wounded young soldier who deserted.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: After Mark contracts typhoid fever and has a vision of his dead mother he no longer seems interested in getting well.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An old friend of Lucas's returns to town in the company of a shady gambler and is accused of cheating at cards.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Several men are vying for a prosperous rancher's daughter's affections. When she is found dead, one of them becomes the prime suspect in her murder.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A playwright makes characters come to life.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A pilot of a downed WW II bomber comes to in the African desert and desperately tries to find out what happened to the rest of his crew.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A luckless couple stumbles upon fortune when a genie materializes from a bottle in their antique shop. The genie grants them four wishes but warns them, prophetically, to be careful what you wish for.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Small time criminal Jackie Rhoades must face both his past and his conscience while waiting for his next assignment.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Bartlett Finchley's paranoia about the machines around proves true.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Seeking refuge from a storm, traveler David Ellington comes upon a bizarre hermitage of monks, who have imprisoned a man who begs for his help. When David confronts the head monk Brother Jerome, he is told that the man is the devil, and David must decide

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A young woman lying in a hospital bed, her head wrapped in bandages, awaits the outcome of a surgical procedure performed by the State in a last-ditch attempt to make her look 'normal'.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A pair of newlyweds stopping in a small town are trapped by their own superstition when playing a fortune-telling machine in a local diner.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The daughter of an inventor objects to their 'perfect' home where they are waited on by mechanical servants.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A nostalgic actor revisits his late wife and friends at their old haunt, only to find that he is now out of place there.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: When three dum-dum crooks get ahold of a camera that takes pictures of the future, they set out to make a quick fortune with their new toy.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: After a derelict Santa Claus is fired on Christmas Eve, he finds a mysterious bag that gives out presents. With this bag he sets out to fulfill his one wish - to see the less fortunate inherit the bounties of Christmas.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: In a tragic, western town, a desperate father begs for clemency as his son is slated to die for an accident he could not have prevented.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: At a prominent club in Washington, D.C., a socialite argues about whether it would be possible to change history by traveling back in time. When he leaves the club he finds himself in 1865, on the night that President Lincoln will be shot.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A used car salesman buys a car that dooms him to tell only the truth.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: When a woman investigates a clamor on the roof of her rural house, she discovers a small UFO and little aliens emerging from it. Or so it seems.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Gaining telepathic abilities when his coin lands on its edge bank clerk Hector B. Poole learns about the difference between other people's plans and fantasies.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: While in the hospital recovering from overwork, Liz Powell keeps dreaming about going down to the hospital morgue.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Passing through the sound barrier a commercial airliner inadvertently travels back in time.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A timid vacuum-cleaner salesman is given the strength of 300 men by some experimenting aliens.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An old radio is taking bitter bachelor Ed Lindsay back to a happier time before what he considers worthless tripe on television when he starts picking up radio programs from the 1930's and 1940's.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler cajoles his friend to use his telekinesis to affect the results of the gambling tables in Las Vegas.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A toy telephone becomes the link between a young boy and his dead grandmother.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A pioneer from a wagon train in 1847 sets off to find something for his ill son and stumbles into present-day New Mexico.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: After successfully stealing a gold shipment, a group of criminals and their scientist accomplice put themselves in suspended animation in a remote desert cave. When they awaken decades later, complications ensue when their truck is destroyed.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Annoyed by a club member's constant chatter, a man bets him he cannot remain silent for a year, living in a glass enclosure in the club basement.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Adam Grant is trapped in a recurring nightmare, in which he is sentenced to death and executed.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick and the Governor convene for a tense negotiation of a peace treaty between their respective groups, hoping to prevent more deaths.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The Governor chases a fleeing dissenter; while the Governor is gone, a traitor tries to sabotage his plans.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The group learns that a truce with the Governor must come with a huge sacrifice on their part; Rick decides Michonne's fate.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: As the Governor's impending attack looms, Rick and the others consider whether the prison is worth defending; Andrea struggles to escape captivity.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The group lives a more peaceful life at the prison and strives to hold onto humanity; problems arise when Rick encounters a new survivor.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Facing a new enemy, Rick abandons his quiet lifestyle so that he and the others can fight to protect their hard-won livelihood.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: A group leaves the prison to search for supplies; the remaining members of the group deal with recent losses.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl and a small group set out on foot in search of medicine, but their mission faces obstacles; Rick and Carol find two uninfected stragglers in a nearby town.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Assorted enemies pressure Rick and the group; the survivors and the prison may reach a breaking point.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Following his defeat at Woodbury, the Governor wanders aimlessly until he encounters a family in need.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: At the camp outside the prison, the addition of new members threatens the peace; something new unfolds as the Governor plans his next move.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Things finally begin to calm at the prison until Rick and the group face imminent danger when the Governor arrives with his forces.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick and Carl look for shelter while Rick deals with old wounds; those left at the prison consider whether survival alone will be enough.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Beth remains hopeful, and she and Daryl search for other survivors of the Governor's attack; the now-divided group faces obstacles in their quest for safety.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick faces a number of threats while Carl and Michonne look for supplies; Glenn and Tara meet strangers on an important missio; other group members deal with their pasts.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: In the woods after fleeing the prison, Beth makes a request that sends her and Daryl on an enlightening mission.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Tyreese, Carol, Lizzie, Mika y Judith llegan a una cabaña mientras buscan Terminus. Allí, Lizzie enloquece y muestra una fascinación por la muerte que hiela la sangre de Carol y Tyreese.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Glenn y Tara se reencuentran con Maggie, Sasha y Bob en un túnel repleto de zombis mientras se aproximan a Terminus. Entretanto, Daryl se ve obligado a viajar con el mismo grupo de hombres que quiere asesinar a Rick.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Los nuevos amigos de Daryl encuentran a Rick y pretenden violar a Michonne y Carl para después matar a los tres. Mientras, Glenn, Maggie, Sasha, Bob, Tara, Abraham, Eugene y Rosita se dan cuenta de que Terminus no es el paraíso que imaginaron.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Carol y Tyreese llegan a las inmediaciones de Terminus y descubren que sus amigos están retenidos y van a ser sacrificados para ser comidos. Ahora, el destino de todo el grupo depende de ellos dos.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El grupo de Rick vaga por el bosque y encuentra a Gabriel, un párroco al que salvan de una horda de zombis y les permite pernoctar en su iglesia. Sin embargo, hay algo extraño en él y esa misma noche uno de los integrantes del grupo es secuestrado.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Gareth y su grupo de caníbales atacan la iglesia mientras Rick y sus compañeros están en el bosque buscándolos para vengar a Bob. Además, el padre Gabriel confiesa el siniestro acto de su pasado que no deja descansar a su conciencia.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Beth se despierta en un hospital de Atlanta, pero pronto se da cuenta de que los mismos que la auxiliaron y sanaron no la dejarán marchar. No obstante, su nuevo amigo, Noah, y ella tratan de huir del recinto.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Mientras se dirigen hacia el norte, el grupo se ve obligado a detenerse porque una horda de zombis bloquea el camino. La tensión aumenta y la situación termina por estallar cuando Eugene confiesa un secreto que había ocultado a todos hasta ahora.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Carol y Daryl persiguen a los captores de Beth por una Atlanta devastada, pero su auto se queda sin gasolina y deben pasar la noche en un refugio para mujeres.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl y Noah regresan a la iglesia para pedirles ayuda a sus compañeros. Rick y otros integrantes del grupo van a Atlanta con la intención de secuestrar a varios policías para intercambiarlos por Beth y Carol.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick busca una salida pacífica al conflicto, pero sus enemigos la rechazan y prefieren zanjar las cosas de forma violenta.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Para cumplir con la promesa que Beth le hizo Noah antes de morir, el grupo se dirige al barrio de Noah, esperando hallar allí protección y a otros supervivientes. Sin embargo, Rick y los suyos no quieren hacerse demasiadas esperanzas.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El vehículo se avería y el grupo continúa a pie hacia Washington D. C., pero les sorprende una tormenta y buscan cobijo en un granero, donde encuentran algo totalmente inesperado e inquietante.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Aaron invita al grupo a Alexandria, su comunidad, un lugar que, según él, es seguro y amigable. Rick, incapaz de olvidar Woodbury y Terminus, desconfía de Aaron, pero Michonne quiere darle una oportunidad.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Los integrantes del grupo tienen entrevistas con Deanna, la jefa de Alexandria, y esperan en las casas que les asignan a saber si son aceptados o rechazados. Cuando conocen a los habitantes de la comunidad, perciben que no están bien entrenados.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agents James T. West and Artemus Gordon help Governor Lewis keep the state of California solvent by seeing that a pledged $5,000,000 from each of three wealthy but disreputable personsis turned over to the governor.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: West meets up again with his old enemy, Dr. Miguelito Loveless, who is engaged in a whimsical plan for wholesale murder.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret Agent West challenges a bizarre scheme to control San Francisco Bay Shipping with rockets fired from Alcatraz Island.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: People living in New Mexico border towns are being terrified by a mysterious outlaw gang known as "Cortez and his Conquistadores."

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Agent West vows to destroy Raven, an organization that induces influential citizens to commit sabotage through mind conditioning.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Agent West's bizarre behavior convinces his cohorts that he has become another victim of the Raven's mind-conditioning plot.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: A dying man's request to preserve a legacy for his young ward sends James T. West to Missouri, where he faces a wholesale conspiracy.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: An Army sergeant's letter to President Grant sends agents West and Gordon to a lonely outpost to fight a gang of terrorists.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agents James T. West and Artemus Gordon help Governor Lewis keep the state of California solvent by seeing that a pledged $5,000,000 from each of three wealthy but disreputable personsis turned over to the governor.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: A tempestuous diva becomes involved in a New Orleans puzzle when kidnappers attempt to abduct her during a singing performance.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: An assignment to take possession of a priceless diamond for the National Museum takes James West to an eerie island estate.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agent West aids a Russian prince in recovering an all-important icon, sought also by a desperate, dangerous enemy.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Agent James T. West is exposed to a deadly plague when he tries to rescue a governor's daughter from a band of stagecoach robbers.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: The board of directors of a corporation owned by a spinsterish tycoon appears to be the target of an insidious plot.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: The number of people entering the building trades is declining. This Old House launched the Generation Next initiative to encourage young people to consider the trades as a viable profession.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Kevin, Richard, and Tom follow a family on their journey to restore an abandoned house in Detroit. The city has a program to bring these empty houses back to life, revitalizing the neighborhoods.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: On November 8, 2018 the residents of Paradise woke to a wildfire that would burn many homes and take lives. This Old House follows three families on their emotional ride as they rebuild their homes.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: This 1880 Country Cape started as a small house on a large piece of land but was added onto over time. The crew meets the homeowners and tours both inside and outside to learn about the plans.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Appliances and radiators are salvaged before the major demolition begins. Outside, an arborist sprays the Hemlock trees to protect from damaging insects. Time to cut off the garage addition.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: The old foundation gets modified for the new basement. Jenn meets with the landscape designer to discuss the plans for the front yard. On the first floor, Charlie and Tom install a recessed beam.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: The foundation is waterproofed. Exterior paint colors are discussed. Homeowner Megan lends a hand turning the new newel posts. Cape style homes are discussed. The foundation is braced for backfilling.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: The old foundation is transitioned to the new. Natural stone is cut into veneers. A new beam is installed on the back dormer for more headroom. Homeowner Megan and her interior designer look at tile.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: A Flitch beam is installed. Tree maintenance is performed. A new footing is poured under the kitchen chimney. Sheathing systems are explored. Kevin tours a high-tech sheathing factory in Georgia.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: A block wall is constructed to accept the addition framing. The old floor joists are shimmed to make a smooth transition to the new part of the house. The kitchen designer lays out the kitchen.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: A bay window is removed and reframed for a new. An old school is being restored into apartments for veterans. The underside of a deck is the "roof" of living space below. Pipe locations are discussed.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: An exterior wall is framed on ground and raised into place. A history of framing tools is given. Recessed lighting and electrical panels are discussed. An old ridge beam is replaced with three LVLs.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Tommy discusses the use of I-joists and LVL beams. Kevin meets woodworker Paul Grouthouse. Kevin and Charlie insulate the original dormers. Landscape designer shares her intentions for the front yard.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: The multi-angled roof has been framed. A remote-controlled skylight is installed. Mini duct system is discussed. The homeowner's mother makes a glass mosaic table. Rotted wood gutter is replaced.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: New material is used for the house's exterior trim. Kevin visits a window restoration shop. Radiant floor heating is installed in the garage. The homeowners tile the basement bathroom.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: The roof gets different types of underlayment. An oak mantle is installed. Brickwork is corrected. The old boiler is disassembled. Exterior clapboards are painted inside. A linear drain is installed.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: A composite deck is installed. The basement gets insulated. Unconventional HVAC zoning is discussed. Kevin tours a stove factory in Reading, PA. Solar panels and their backup system are installed.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: The master bathroom gets a plaster treatment. Windowsills are replicated in Dracut, MA. A kitchen garden, recessed lighting, and floating countertop are installed. New wood floors change directions.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: The 1880s Country Cape is finished. The cast arrives and reflects on the changes that have been made since Charlie's crew started work. The homeowners take Kevin and Tommy on a tour of the house.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: It's a new project. We meet a new builder Deliandro and homeowners Robyn and Derek in the West Roxbury section of Boston. Robyn gives a tour. Derek is an architect and drew the construction plans.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: The inside is demo'ed. Beams are installed to replace a load-bearing wall. A willow is pruned, and house wrap is installed. The homeowners select kitchen cabinets. A wider window opening is created.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Outside, windows are trimmed with PVC, and the house gets sided with fiber cement clapboards. An American Elm resistant to Dutch Elm disease is planted. Inside, a drainpipe puzzle is solved.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Ipe is installed on the front porch. A heat pump coil is added to the existing furnace. Back at the house, a brick patio is built. At the Dracut Centre School, original corbel replicas are installed.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: The old front steps are replaced. The homeowners decide on interior flooring. Kevin visits a trade school. Cable railing and new door are installed out back, and a brick walkway out front.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Lighting is being installed outside and preparation for in-floor heat is happening in the primary bathroom. The homeowners pick lighting for the dining room and father and son install drywall.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: The original foundation is repaired. Antique windows are installed in Dracut, MA. The wood floors are patched, and a bathroom is prepped for tile. Aluminum gutters that look like wood are explored.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Cabinets and a vent hood are being installed in the kitchen. The homeowners' daughter chooses a paint color for her room. A stained glass window is repaired, and floor tiles are laid out for install.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack finds himself in a state of panic when he juggles three gourmet dinners in three different apartments.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack's first day behind the grill at a diner heats up hilariously when his attractive boss tries to spice up her life. Guest Star(s): Ellen Travolta

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack believes Chrissy's friend is the perfect sweetie to bring home to mom, until Janet discovers she's a high-priced call girl headed for a wild convention.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack snows a stunning skier named Inga into believing he's a downhill champion.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Janet frantically tries to keep Jack and Larry from finding out they are both dating the same beautiful woman.

programme.title: Three's Company

programme.title: Montell Griffin vs James Toney 1
programme.desc: On February 18th, 1995 Montell Griffin faced James Toney for the first time at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas for the IBF Inter-continental Light Heavyweight title with the bout ending with a majority decision win for Griffin.

programme.title: Montell Griffin vs James Toney 2
programme.desc: On December 6th, 1996 Montell Griffin and James Toney fought for a second time at the Lawlor Events Center in Reno for World Light Heavyweight titles resulting in an unanimous decision win for Griffin.

programme.title: Muhammad Ali vs Cleveland Williams
programme.desc: On November 14th, 1966 Muhammad Ali faced Cleveland Williams at the Astrodome in Houston, TX. They fought for WBC World Heavyweight titles in what was supposed to be a 15 round bout only went 3 resulting in a win for Ali.

programme.title: Muhammad Ali vs Ernie Terrell
programme.desc: On February 6th, 1967 Muhammad Ali fought Ernie Terrel at the Astrodome in Hourston, Tx. They fought for WBA and WBC World Heavyweight titles in a bout that went 15 rounds ending in a unanimous decision victory for Ali.

programme.title: Muhammad Ali vs Floyd Patterson 2
programme.desc: On September 20th, 1972 Muhammad Ali faced Floyd Patterson for a second time at Madison Square Garden in New York that ended in the seventh round due to swelling and cuts on Pattersons eye giving the victory to Ali.

programme.title: Muhammad Ali vs Joe Frazier 3
programme.desc: On October 1st, 1975, Muhammad Ali and Joe Frazier fought for the third time for the World Heavyweight Title. Known as the "Thrilla in Manila," Ali ultimately emerged as the victor in what is considered one of the greatest boxing matches of all time.

programme.title: Muhammad Ali vs Mac Foster
programme.desc: On April 1st, 1972 Muhammad Ali and Mac Foster fought in a fifteen round bout that ended in a unanimous decision win for Ali.

programme.title: Muhammad Ali vs Oscar Natalio Bonavena
programme.desc: On December 7th, 1970 Muhammad Ali faced Oscar Natalio Bonavena in a 15 round bout with Bonavena going down three times in the last round forcing an automatic stoggage giving the win to Ali.

programme.title: Muhammad Ali vs. Joe Frazier 2
programme.desc: On January 28th, 1974 Muhammad Ali and Joe Frazier face eachother for a second time at Madison Square Garden in New York for North American Boxing Federation Heavyweight titles resulting in a strong win for Ali.

programme.title: Muhammad Ali vs. Ken Norton 2
programme.desc: On September 10th, 1973 Muhammad Ali and Ken Norton participated in their second meeting at the Forum in Inglewood, CA. They fought for the North American Boxing Federation Heavyweight title with Ali winning this time with split decision.

programme.title: Naoya Inoue vs Jason Moloney
programme.desc: On October 31st, 2020 Naoya Inoue faced Jason Moloney in The Bubble at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas for the IBF and WBA World Super Bantamweight titles ending in a knockout in the 7th round by Inoue.

programme.title: Naoya Inoue vs Nonito Donaire II
programme.desc: On June 7th, 2022 Naoya Inoue battled Nonoito Donaire for a second time at the Super Arena in Saitama for IBF, WBA and WBC World Bantamweight title with Inoue ending the bout in the second round defeating Donaire.

programme.title: Nonito Donaire vs Jorge Arce
programme.desc: On December 15th, 2012 Nonito Donaire faced Jorge Arce at the Toyota Center in Houston, Tx. With the bout ending in the third round with a win by Donaire, Arce announced his retirement in the ring after the bout.

programme.title: Orlando Salido vs Juan Manuel Lopez 2

programme.title: Oscar De La Hoya vs Curtis Strong

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Paladin is hired by a man to deliver ten thousand dollars. Paladin has to sift through a numbr of suspects, including a band of gypsies and the men who found the body.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: New Mexico rancher Jesse Reade hires Paladin for $1,000 to bring back outlaw Dave Enderly, who has run off to Perdido, Mexico with Reade's daughter Nancy.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Manfred Holt breaks out of jail, killing two deputies. Is he on his way to kill the banker who testified against him, or to see his family for the last time?

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: A sportsman sponsors a contest, betting that no one can elude his posse in the Mojave Desert. When Paladin shows up riding a camel, the man decides that the only way he can still win is to get rid of Paladin.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: At a stagecoach stop, Paladin sees a peaceful Cherokee rancher being beaten by men who think his cattle are spreading a sickness.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Suspicious of a possible connection between a daring payroll robbery and the shooting of a postmaster in the mining district, Sheriff Hollister and the postman's wife stage a grim and dangerous maneuver to lure the culprits out into the open.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Johnny Ringo, enraged by poker losses, holds up the other players. When he cools off, Ringo returns the money. However, a politically ambitious judge uses the incident to persecute Ringo, discredit Sheriff Hollister and win personal popularity.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: A cattle broker who deals with rustlers sets out to crush The Epitaph and Sheriff Clay Hollister, whose combined efforts are hurting his operations. He hires a has-been newspaperman to start a rival newspaper and the strategy seems to be succeeding!

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Sheriff Hollister faces off against Apache chief Geronimo after an army supply train is attacked. In a shootout, Clay kills one brave and captures another. In retaliation, Geronimo warns more will die unless Hollister releases the Indian prisoner.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Fugitive Logan Beatty hides out at the ranch of Alan Danbury. Danbury's daughter Kay, falling in love with the outlaw, helps disarm Sheriff Hollister when he comes to arrest Beatty. Hollister, Beatty, and Kay's father battle for the girl.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Mitt Porter is involved in a robbery in which his partner Billy Clyde kills a man. Hollister tricks Matt into leading him to Billy's hideout, but Billy is killed before he can clear Mitt. Hollister and the editor then learn about the tragedy of his life.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: In love with Sally Wilson, Bill Hartley strikes a vein of silver while working on Tombstone's Main Street and sees a chance to win her heart. But when Bill is buried in a cave in, Sally must decide if she saves Bill or guard the secret of the mine.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah gives the Big Five one last chance to redeem themselves in a five-on-two tag team duel where Yugi and Joey take on the entire Big Five!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five concentrate their attack on Joey so that Yugi would be forced to duel all alone! Outmanned and overpowered, Yugi and Joey are near the end of the line!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five summon an almighty dragon that previously defeated Joey, Mai, and Mokuba! Joey and Yugi pull out all the stops, but is that enough to avoid their minds being scattered over virtual reality?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel for control of KaibaCorp when Noah squares off against Kaiba! But can Kaiba fight at full strength after he learns the hidden truth about Noah... and the tragic past that made him what he is today?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah's Shinato's Ark steals monsters into its keep to use as an impenetrable wall of servants! How can Kaiba hurt Noah when Noah has an endless stream of monsters to protect himself with?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's about to finish Noah, but Mokuba protects Noah from his final blow! Will Kaiba sacrifice his beloved brother in exchange for freedom, or will the brotherly bond remain unbreakable?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: For every turn that passes, one of Yugi's friends is transformed into stone! As more and more of his friends harden into solid rock, can Yugi defeat Noah before he runs out of turns and transforms into stone himself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are petrified into solid stone statues, but their spirits live on! Their combined souls energize Yugi into a noble fight, but is spirit going to win the duel when Yugi's not drawing the right cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has defeated Noah... but they still can't escape from the virtual world! The real reason behind their entrapment is revealed... as is the true villain pulling the strings!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Kaiba squares off against his stepfather Gozaburo for their final battle, Yugi and friends are attacked by endless hordes of monsters! Their only hope is Noah, but they can't expect help from their enemy... can they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Time is almost up before the missile's explosion destroys Yugi and friends! Will the Battle City finalists beat the clock and live to duel another day in the stunning conclusion to the virtual world saga!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends arrive at KaibaCorp Island where the Battle City finalists will compete in the ultimate dueling arena! Get ready for the awesome four-person battle royal where any duelist can attack anyone else!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Honor, friendship, revenge... As each duelist remembers what they're fighting for, the battle royal rages on where none of the duelists know where the next attack is going to come from!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey may have fought some of the fiercest fights in Battle City, but has all his training taught him to become an elite duelist? Joey's gonna show what he's made of in the conclusion to the four-man battle royal!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik ensnares Joey in a Shadow Game where each duelist's heart is linked with his monsters... literally! Every time a monster received damage, the duelist feels the pain instead!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik's Helpoemer send Joey's powerful cards to the graveyard before Joey can use them! Running low on cards and life points, Joey's opportunities for staging a comeback are nearly depleted!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey thinks this duel can't turn any worse... but Marik has all the pieces necessary to summon The Winged Dragon of Ra! Can Joey prevent Marik from summoning the Egyptian God Card, or is victory simply not in the cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik transforms The Winged Dragon of Ra into its powerful form, the Egyptian God Phoenix! If Joey can't withstand the Phoenix's blazing fire, he'll lose the duel... plus his only chance to save Mai from her mental prison!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the rematch we've all been waiting for! Yugi and Kaiba square off for the first time since Duelist Kingdom in front of thousands of ravenous fans for the right to challenge Marik! It's time to duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba has all the monsters necessary to summon Obelisk the Tormentor to finish Yugi off! Though overwhelmed and outmatched, nothing is going to stop Yugi from trying to summon his Egyptian God first!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon clashes against Kaiba's Obelisk the Tormentor, what will happen when two Egyptian Gods fight each other? It's time to find out which Egyptian God is truly stronger!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The clash of the two Egyptian God Monsters releases mystical energies that show Yugi and Kaiba visions of the ancient Egyptian past! What new answers do these images unlock, and what prophecies do they make for the future?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons three powerful Blue-Eyes White Dragons, but Yugi has no monsters remaining in his deck! Is losing only a matter of time, or will a long-dormant card from a fallen friend help turn the tide of battle?
